parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[Array]] of [[Boolean]]s in format [enabledChat, enabledVoN] for the given channel. For more information about enabling/disabling of chat channels see [[enableChannel]].
{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center"
! colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"16" <template><title>!</title></template> [[Channel IDs|channel ID]] number correspondence
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Global
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Side
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Command
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Group
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Vehicle
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Direct
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom1
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom2
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom3
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom4
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom5
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom6
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom7
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom8
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom9
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Custom10
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 1
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 2
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 3
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 4
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 5
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 6
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 7
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 8
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 9
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 10
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 11
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 12
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 13
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 14
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 15
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[channelEnabled]] channelID

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> channelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|Channel ID]] (see description)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [enabledChat, enabledVoN]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isGlobalChatEnabled = ([[channelEnabled]] 0) [[select]] 0; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>check if user can use text on global channel</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isGlobalVoiceEnabled = ([[channelEnabled]] 0) [[select]] 1; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>check if user can use the VoN on global channel</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>([[channelEnabled]] 0) [[params]] ["_isGlobalChatEnabled", "_isGlobalVoiceEnabled"]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>sets both variables</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentChannel]], [[setCurrentChannel]], [[getPlayerChannel]], [[enableChannel]], [[radioChannelCreate]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
